>
[Pinpoint Poisoner](/Feats.aspx?ID=5785) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemist" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=812" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 67 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Archetypes** [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=71) (Level 10), [Poisoner](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=259) (Level 10)

</column>

---

Unsuspecting targets are especially vulnerable to your poisons. When you successfully Strike an [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creature with a poisoned weapon or expose an off-guard creature to an [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=634) poison, that creature takes a –2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison.
